sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> carries a <radical>cross</radical> into your <kanji>soup</kanji>. Hey tsunami, I was eating that soup!
meaningInfo: Picture a bowl of soup, but now there is a cross and some tsunami water in it.
readingMnemonic: You pull the cross out of your <kanji>soup</kanji> and see that the cross' <reading>jew</reading>els (<ja>じゅう</ja>) fell off and are in there now. The jewels sparkle, shine, and dissolve into the soup!
readingInfo: You're curious so you take a sip of this jewel soup and... it's delicious! You should make more and sell it!
